com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface DependencyEnhancer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidBinary, AndroidInstrumentationApk, AndroidLibrary, AndroidManifest, GwtBinary, JavaTest, RobolectricTest

    public interface DependencyEnhancer
    Describes the way in which a Buildable will transform its declared dependencies.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImmutableSortedSet<BuildRule> getEnhancedDeps(BuildRuleResolver ruleResolver, Iterable<BuildRule> declaredDeps, Iterable<BuildRule> inferredDeps)
      A Buildable may employ graph enhancement to alter its dependencies.

    • Method Detail

      • getEnhancedDeps

        ImmutableSortedSet<BuildRule> getEnhancedDeps(BuildRuleResolver ruleResolver,
                                            Iterable<BuildRule> declaredDeps,
                                            Iterable<BuildRule> inferredDeps)
        A Buildable may employ graph enhancement to alter its dependencies. If it does this, it must return the new dependencies via this method. The inferredDeps are derived by looking at a ConstructorArg's public fields other than deps and finding any that are or contain BuildRules. The union of these and the declaredDeps provides all the known dependencies of a rule.

        Implementors of this interface will normally want to return the inferredDeps unchanged, and only modify the declaredDeps. As such, the general usage pattern is: 

         public ImmutableSortedSet>BuildRule> getEnhancedDeps(
     BuildRuleResolver ruleResolver,
     Iterable declaredDeps,
     Iterable inferredDeps) {
   ImmutableSortedSet.Builder>BuildRule> builder = ImmutableSortedSet.naturalOrder();
   builder.addAll(inferredDeps);

   ...

   return builder.build();
 }
        Parameters:
        ruleResolver - that can be used to get the BuildRule that corresponds to a BuildTarget if the rule for the target has already been constructed.
        declaredDeps - The BuildRules declared in the deps parameter of a rule.
        inferredDeps - Any dependencies detected by scanning all the parameters except deps of a rule.
        Returns:
        The deps for the BuildRule that contains this Buildable. These may differ from the deps specified in the original build file due to graph enhancement.
